Virus scan:

http://virusscan.jotti.org/en/scanresult/b8274ac5072ad35a0ed80e9ff6c8899ec07b390d

(Virustotal was down.)

To make your wallpaper in Vista and up:

1.Right click the desktop.

2.Personalize.

3.Desktop Background.

4.Click the browse button.

5.File location

6.Done.

Updates:

Background color changed to gray.

Ipod/Iphone/Android background:

I don\'t know how to set IOS backgrounds.
I think we know how to change a desktop background in Windows 7.

I think we know how to change a desktop background in Windows 7.

-.- I don\'t want to be constantly asked how to change a background.

So I put that there incase.

People who don\'t know how to (or how to even use google) don\'t even deserve backgrounds... :
Tim, once again you have exposed your brilliance.
So is this a place to brag about and/or share our backgrounds?

This is the off-topic forum. What do you expect, I mean there was once a thread here about 2+2...

And on which is better, Imperial Measurements or Metric Measurements.

Even though, I live in the USA, and am used to US customary, I still like metric because it makes measurement. SOOOooooOOOOOooooooOOOOOoooooOOOOOoooooOOOOOoooooOOOOOoooooOOOOOoooooOOOOooooOOOOOooooOOOooo...
